title: Record-breaking week for NFT market as sales top $412m
description: Recent data from Cryptoslam.io has shown a significant uptick in the non-fungible token (NFT) market, with sales over the last seven days reaching $412,384,130, a 35.14% increase from the previous week’s figures.Â  This marks the third consecutive week of growth in the NFT sector.
